channel.title: Devil worshippers
channel.description: What do you think about devil worshippers. I mean they are beyond Emos/Goths. These are the kind that would murder to pleaze the "Devil". I find it sick and very unammusing. :|How about you?

item.title: Devil worshippers
item.dc:creator: @Rictoo Rictoo
item.description:
@Rictoo wrote:

Are you trying to tell me I am just hallucinating the Chrisitian Evangelists that come knocking on my door only to get slammed in the face?

Those are most likely Mormons, a denomination of Protestants

Are you trying to tell me that If I say Fuck you I'm going to hell and therefore I cannot say it is not making me follow their rules?

I didn’t understand the end, but if you say “Fuck You”, that is most certainly not a ticket to Hell

Are you trying tell me that not being allowed to eat beef and pork is not making me follow their rules?

Okay, in the Orthodox Church, we fast on Wednesday’s and Fridays (not allowed to eat Meat and Dairy Products). Fasting is just something to help us give up wordly passions to more fully enter into the realm of Christianity.

Are you trying to tell me forbidding same sex marriage is not making you conform to their rules?

The Orthodox don’t believe it is right, but we do not protest against it like the Protestants -.-’

Man is truly free when he listens to himself and not a 2000 year old textbook of lies and prophecies.

Yes, the Old Testement is basically all prophecies, but tell me ONE place that lies (Old or New Testement)

Read full topic

item.title: Devil worshippers
item.dc:creator: @Rictoo Rictoo
item.description:
@Rictoo wrote:

VG_Kobra:

B: I don’t see how this is an arguement as you are just reinforcing my point about how Christians tooks Pagan symbology and defamed it by calling him the Outcast one and other crap. If you truly beleive that ther was such as thing as Lucifer and he went to the “dark side” I suppose you still believe in Santa Claus…Oh wait I heard he was dubbed a heathen as well! In a Chrisitian Radical’s eyes anyone who is not a Christian is apparenntly wrong and “misguided”. God’s people = Pathetic :rolleyes:

About the, “If you truly beleive that ther was such as thing as Lucifer and he went to the “dark side” I suppose you still believe in Santa Claus”, that was just… gay, c’mon I am trying to be serious here
And also, please don’t regard me as a Protestant. The Orthodox don’t believe that anyone who is not a Christian is misguided We only call Protestants misguided xD
